tweet.text: (1/2) Tensions were high in 1983 when the Soviets downed the #KAL007 commercial airliner, killing all 269 people on board. In #FRUS, read a transcript of Secretary of Defense Caspar Weinberger’s handwritten notes after the shoot down: https://t.co/87besHUJ0G https://t.co/kr4yrSIJMm
